Our MOF

NovNat Techâ€™s proprietary MOF (UK patent application number:2218176.2), has shown breakthrough water sorption performance with unprecedented capacity and kinetics. With the capacity to capture from air at relative humidity (RH) as low as 10% the MOF is functional in any part of the world.

Technology challenges

  • Capacity

    Our MOF is capable of capturing up to 60% of its body weight in water from the air (at 90% RH).

  • Kinetics

    Early tests have shown the proprietary MOF can capture up to 63 L/kg/day.

  • Tuneability

    The MOF has been precisely engineered to have a high affinity to water molecules, thereby, capturing water molecules from the air regardless of how contaminated the air is.

About

We are committed to creating a world where water is accessible to all.
